notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by the World Health Organization, UNICEF/UNDP/World Bank/WHO Special Programme for Research and Training in Tropical Diseases, and the European Unionâ€™s Seventh Framework Programme for research, technological development and demonstration (grant FP7-281803 IDAMS; http://www.idams.eu/; publication reference number IDAMS: 53)
The funders had no role in the study design, data collection and analysis, or preparation of the manuscript.
